summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to water services of Seattle Public Utilities; revising water rates and charges and terms and conditions for fire service; revising water charges and terms and conditions for wholesale customers; revising franchise fees charged to residents of the City of Shoreline; and amending Seattle Municipal Code subsections 21.04.430C, 21.04.440C, 21.04.440D and 21.04.440E in connection therewith.
